markdownRemark.excerpt: This theme supports link posts, made famous by John Gruber. To use, just add  to the post’s YAML front matter and you’re done. And this is how a quote looks…
markdownRemark.html:
This theme supports link posts, made famous by John Gruber. To use, just add link: http://url-you-want-linked to the post’s YAML front matter and you’re done.

And this is how a quote looks.

Some link can also be shown.

frontmatter.title: Sample Link Post
frontmatter.description: Try click on the link icon.

frontmatter.title: Testing "Readability" with a Bunch of Text
